description.value:
Cost 1 fireworks display

Effect Chaos fills a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] within 120 feet. All creatures in the area take @Damage[3d6[fire],3d6[sonic]|options:area-damage]{3d6 fire damage and 3d6 sonic damage} and must attempt a @Check[fortitude|against:class-spell|options:area-effect,damaging-effect] save. You can expend versatile vials to increase the potency of this effect; for each versatile vial you expend as part of this display, increase the fire and sonic damage by 1d6 each.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened] until the end of its next turn and takes half damage.

Failure The creature is dazzled and deafened for 1 minute and takes full damage.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] for 1 round, dazzled and deafened for 1 minute, and takes double damage.
